title: FS: t206 SGC 30 commons ~ lot of 44 cards

posts.post_title: FS: t206 SGC 30 commons ~ lot of 44 cards
posts.post_content:
Following is for sale:  Partial lot sold, down to 20

Lot of Forty-four (44) SGC 30 commons:

$1,100 ($25/card) ~ lot price

will also sell in smaller groups (say 5 or more, but price may increase a bit depending on lot size)

All cards are different and have Pied or SC backs...

Atz, Bell/Pitching, Camnitz, Cassidy, Crandall/No Cap, Dougherty/Portrait, Ganzel, Gilbert, Hulswitt, Liebhardt,  McQuillan/Ball in Hand, Miller, Nicholls/Hands On Knees, Pfeister/Seated, Phelan, Schlei, Spade, Stahl/No Glove, Weimer, Wiltse/Pitching


If interested, please email me...

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]
some editing made, email please only, no PMs if interested in a group.
